venue.address_1: 1000 Winter Street, Bay Colony Corporate Center
venue.name: Emerging Enterprise Center at Foley Hoag

item.description:
Mobile Smartphones and Tablets - Tools or Toys

Tuesday, February 15, 2011

www.entretechforum.org

There is a lot of talk that this is the year of the tablet and the rapid adoption of smartphones in America. The key question, however, is how can the enterprise cost effectively adopt these new technologies and afterward measure their effectiveness. Will the adoption of these devices require major capital investments? What tools exist or will emerge to enable the enterprise to utilize these mobile devices? What are the new business opportunities that are being created? Come hear our panelists views and bounce your ideas/observations off of this distinguished panel

The February EntreTech Forum panel will be discussing ways the enterprise can integrate these technologies into their existing platforms and analytics to evaluate them. Our panelists are drawn from locally-based leaders in the various worlds of telecom innovation, web analytics, and mobile app development.

Moderator:
Rich Lane – President – Blue Danube Labs; Angel Investor – Walnut Venture Associates

Panelists:
Michael Kuperstein – Co-founder & CTO – Mobiflex, Inc.
Ryder Daniels – President – Capsaicin LLC
Paul Berman – Founder – Tortuga 22, Inc.

Meeting Organizers:
Andrew Fairbairn
Larry Grumer

Meeting Time: 6:30 - 9:30 p

Meeting Cost:$25 public, $10 students,
Active Military: Promotional Registrations

Register Online
